job.title: Data Scientist - Apple Retail Online
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe people here at Apple dont just build products  we craft the kind of wonder thats revolutionized entire industries Its the diversity of those people and their ideas that supports the innovation that runs through everything we do from amazing technology to industryleading environmental efforts Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found itbrbrbrWe are seeking a Senior Strategy Analyst to strategize prioritize plan design and analyses that will have direct and measurable impact to Apples global retail contact center RCC operations We are looking for a selfstarter with outstanding statistical analysis experience as well as the ability to apply the findings from the analysis to business operations This is a strategic partnership role and will report into the Apple Retail Contact Center planning team In this role you will work multifunctionally with a wide range of Apple teams including Global RCC Retail Finance Business Operation Work Force Management on defining planning prioritizing and delivering the business analytics initiativesbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExcellent statistical skills in applied regression spatial and time series modelingbrbrDeep understanding of design of experiments principlesbrbrValidated solid understanding of SQL Teradata preferred SAS and RbrbrExperience with scripting and automation of data extraction data mining transformation and modeling outputsbrbrProficiency with data visualization such as TableaubrbrConsistent track record of independently solving complex business problems with hypothesis establishing data collection sophisticated statistical analysis and scalable process creationbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong br  Be a selfstarter motivated accountable and a highly upbeat teammatebrbr  Good communication skill with excellent verbal and written presentation skills  able to promote data informed decisionmakingbrbr  Passionate about understanding the fundamental reasons that customers contacting Apple RCC and independently build scalable modeling to forecast future contactsbrbr  5 years of forecasting experience will be a plus preferably within a retail domainbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelors Degree Required  Applied Social Sciences Business Administration Marketing Finance Operations Research or related fields Masters Degree desirablebrbr brRole Number 200273908brbr
